title: Hypivisor Rust unit test gaps (spawn.rs, fs_browser.rs)
summary: Added 15 new Rust unit tests: 9 tests for spawn.rs (validate_spawn_path: path outside home, nonexistent path, new folder creation, whitespace trim, empty folder, canonicalization, path traversal, nested dirs, whitespace-only folder) and 6 tests for fs_browser.rs (sorted output, empty dir, nonexistent path, files-only, canonical path, hidden dirs). Refactored validate_spawn_path out of spawn_agent for testability. All 41 hypivisor tests pass. Release binary rebuilt.
